p<-sig_contribs %>% 
  gather(signature, value, -ID) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=value, fill=signature))+
    geom_histogram(bins=500)+
    facet_grid(signature~.)+
    scale_fill_viridis(discrete=TRUE)+
    theme_bw()+
    theme(legend.position="none")

sggplotly(p)

    dplyr::select(-ID) %>%
    ggpairs()+
    theme_bw()

sggplotly(p2)
